resume_model(model, optimizer, resume, strict=True)¶

optimizer_pth = os.path.join(self.model_root, “optimizer_{}.pth”.format(self.net_type)) resume or finetune model torch.save({“epoch”: epoch,

“model”: model.state_dict(), “optimizer”: optimizer.state_dict()}, optimizer_pth)

返回
